63.title: Larry (Terence Parkes), 1927-
notes:
British cartoonist
        who signs his work "Larry," born Terence Parkes on November 19,
        1927 in Birmingham, England. The Library of Congress uses only
        the name Larry as his entry. See from Parkes,
   Terence, 1927- ; see alsos from Cartoonists; British
   cartoonists
